attributes.action: We call on the Tory Party to have a vote of no confidence
attributes.additional_details: The EU is an oversized undemocratic organisation which only the rich get rich and does not benefit the countries of the EU countries outside the EU seem to be better off countries like Norway Switzerland who have the freedom to trade with the world at the moment Britain is being held back by the Bureaucrats  of Brussels, it is a tool of the NWO who want to dominate the world with one ambition to have one currency one government and one Army we need to stop this by getting out of the EU.
attributes.background: Theresa May has betrayed the people of Britain by her proposed deal to the EU the referendum on leaving the EU was quite clear either leave or stay not to bow down to the EU, The PM has discarded the democratic system and betrayed the whole country with her appeasement to the EU the PM should go

rejection.details: This petition is calling on the Conservative party, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
